description:
This course is designed for –

  1. An existing creative business owner who wants to take their company to the next level through smart processes, increase sales volume and improved internal organization.
  2. A freelancer looking to grow their creative business and wants a serious jumpstart to many of the concepts and documents related to sales and internal process.

This course is a collection of over 225+ files that I have personally created over the course of my 10 year history running a creative agency, generating over $7,000,000 in revenue.

Additional resources include:

  • 16 real sales proposals from 10 different industries in Word format to use right away
  • 7 cold calling scripts
  • The actual operating agreement I used to found 3 different companies ($500+ value!)
  • Sample sales collateral my agency used to generate over $1,000,000 in revenue
  • Full access to my Google Site company wiki to use as you please
  • Hundreds other files, templates and resources

PLUS – I am fully available for any questions, ideas or brainstorming you may have to help improve your creative agency's sales and processes! Simply post your questions and I'll be checking daily to help as we go along.

These materials are actual contracts, processes, workflows and more used with employees and clients nationwide.

The course is much like a Vegas buffet where you'll be allowed to explore and target the content that is most relevant to you. Each group of materials comes with an overview video highlighting the key material and learning lessons.
title: The Complete Creative Agency Tool Kit: Sales & Process
